Verbal Consent Scripts — Twilio

Business: Jason Stillerman. Purpose: SMS notifications

1) SMS/MMS Opt‑In (Verbal)

"Hi, this is Jason Stillerman. I'd like to send you text messages at this number to notify you of emails/iMessages while you don't have data or WiFi. Message frequency varies, msg/data rates may apply. You can reply STOP to opt out at any time and HELP for help. Do I have your permission to send you text messages at this number?" If YES: "Thank you. I'm confirming you consent to receive text messages from Jason Stillerman at this number. You'll receive a confirmation text shortly. Remember: reply STOP to opt out, HELP for help." If NO: "No problem. I won't send any text messages."
